For example, if your monitor is using a fixed refresh rate of60 Hz (refreshes every 1/60 second), the video output with frame rates higher than that can beout of sync with your monitor. Then you have multiple frames displayed at once on your scree, which is the screen tearing issue.

Another possible cause is problem device drivers. You may be having the issue because of the wrong or out-of-date drivers.

How to fix my tearing screen?
